sansSerif.$description: Primitive font family stack sansSerif (primary: Ubuntu Sans)

monospace.$description: Primitive font family stack monospace (primary: Ubuntu Sans Mono)

italic.$description: Primitive font style italic (This token type is not yet supported by the W3C DTCG specification, so it is stored in $extensions and requires a token transformer compatible with Canonical design system extensions.)

subscript.$description: Primitive font position subscript (This token type is not yet supported by the W3C DTCG specification, so it is stored in $extensions and requires a token transformer compatible with Canonical design system extensions.)

superscript.$description: Primitive font position superscript (This token type is not yet supported by the W3C DTCG specification, so it is stored in $extensions and requires a token transformer compatible with Canonical design system extensions.)

normal.$description: Primitive figure style normal (This token type is not yet supported by the W3C DTCG specification, so it is stored in $extensions and requires a token transformer compatible with Canonical design system extensions.)

oldStyleFigure.$description: Primitive figure style oldStyleFigure (This token type is not yet supported by the W3C DTCG specification, so it is stored in $extensions and requires a token transformer compatible with Canonical design system extensions.)

liningFigures.$description: Primitive figure style liningFigures (This token type is not yet supported by the W3C DTCG specification, so it is stored in $extensions and requires a token transformer compatible with Canonical design system extensions.)

underline.$description: Primitive text decoration underline (This token type is not yet supported by the W3C DTCG specification, so it is stored in $extensions and requires a token transformer compatible with Canonical design system extensions.)

strikethrough.$description: Primitive text decoration strikethrough (This token type is not yet supported by the W3C DTCG specification, so it is stored in $extensions and requires a token transformer compatible with Canonical design system extensions.)

default.$description: Primitive letter case default (This token type is not yet supported by the W3C DTCG specification, so it is stored in $extensions and requires a token transformer compatible with Canonical design system extensions.)

smallcaps.$description: Primitive letter case smallcaps (This token type is not yet supported by the W3C DTCG specification, so it is stored in $extensions and requires a token transformer compatible with Canonical design system extensions.)
